imdb.plot outline: "Hi India" (Hola India) is an incredible travel to Nord India (Rajasthan). A first immersion to the sounds, music and colors of India. You never will be the same persons after an Indian Travel, so , this Documentary Series is a very nice first approach to this incredible culture .
imdb.title: Hola India
plot: First immersion to India. "Hi India" (_Hola India_ (qv)) its a TV Documentary series (5 chapters x 26'). Its a kind of documentary that tell you about sounds, colors and Indian music.::Roly Santos

"Hi India" (_Hola India_ (qv)) is an incredible travel to Nord India (Rajasthan). A first immersion to the sounds, music and colors of India.
